runs.comm: that steepling bounce! He bowls it across the right-hander and AB gets beaten by the steep bounce from a length
on the leg side, the batsman tucks it away to fine leg for the first run. Only 195 more to go
back of length delivery on the middle and leg line, David whips it past square leg, and the fielder at fine leg has to come around and stop the boundary
what a shot! It was back of length angling across the right-hander. Davids stands tall and punches it hard through cover for the first boundary. Super shot
back of length delivery on the middle stump line, comes very quickly to the batsman who gets hit around the abdominal area as he goes for the pull
loses direction as he bowls this one down the leg side
another one down the leg side and is called a wide. But there was some interest by the bowler. It did take a faint nick, but wouldnt have mattered as Kamran didn't take it cleanly
back of length on the middle and leg line, flicked away to deep midwicket for a couple
bowls a screamer first up! It was quick, just short of length and goes away with the angle, just beats the outside edge
charges down the track aiming his short over extra cover, but gets an inside edge towards the leg side
suuuuweeeet! He plays that shot so well. Just lifts the length ball on off with a straight bat, over extra cover
mix-up in the middle, but a bad throw from cover towards non-striker saves Davids.
slower ball on off, AB drives it in the air past short cover without any feet movement, gets it as far as wide mid-off. It wasn't far off from the fielder
caught at mid-on! Completely beaten by the slower ball. It was on off stump and the batsman gets his timing completely wrong as he ends up lobbing it tamely towards mid-on.
makes room by moving outside leg and tries to go inside out, but Irfan is too quick and the ball goes past the outside edge
on the pads, and the batsman stays on the back foot and swats it past short fine leg for a boundary
slower delivery on off stump, AB dabs it towards point but there is no single there
oh that wasn't far from the point fielder. AB charged down the track and steered the full delivery past point for another boundary
and here comes the dilscoop! Beautifully done, infact he sends it all the way over the fine leg boundary.
back of length delivery on off, climbs up to the batsman, AB dabs it to point
bowls it across the right-hander and Faf gets beaten as he goes inside out. It is been called a wide again. Outrageous call. They have made a few of those today
back of length on off stump, the batsman stays on the back foot and drops it towards cover point for a single
another back of length delivery on off stump, AB stays on the back foot but is not able to get it away. Junaid fields
length ball for the first time in the over and AB clears his front leg out and goes straight over the bowler's head. He doesn't get hold of it, but enough to take it to the boundary
moves outside leg stump and guides the back of the length delivery towards point for a single
length ball on middle and off and again AB goes inside out, this time it is just a chip shot that goes over the infield and scoots towards the boundary, where Hafeez makes a sliding stop
that shot is again on show! He gets down on his knee and ramps it over short fine leg, not a six this time though

starts of with a length ball and Faf tries to go over the top straightaway, but doesn't get much behind it as he just chips it over Irfan tower at mid-on. He struggles to get to the ball, a bit of a comedy as he comes down

caught behind! Would you believe it. It is caught by Kamran Akmal, on the second attempt. It was a length delivery on off stump and the batsman tries to again go over the top, he gets a faint edge and it goes straight to the keeper, who fumbles it once but manages to hold on to it.

caught at third man! it is two in two now. The batsman moves outside the leg stump in an attempt to launch the first ball over the off side, but he gets a big outside edge that flies to third-man fielder. Morris goes first ball
fuller delivery on off, AB calmly drives it to mid-off
short of length slower delivery on off, the batsman stays on the back foot and dabs it down to third man

it is number three now, the batsman shuffles across to play a flick to this full delivery on the middle. He misses and it is a straightforward call for the umpire. That was hitting middle. Three in the over
short of length on off stump, AB moves outside leg and tries to carve it to off but gets beaten
back of length on off, AB cuts it but finds Malik at point
tries to go with the ramp shot again, but the ball thuds on the pads and runs fine on the leg side. It is given as runs
Oh that is the big wicket! Irfan bowls a quick yorker on off stump and AB, who had moved outside the leg side, gets a faint inside edge and it rattles the stumps. This is it.
gets a low full-toss on off stump, but he plays a defensive shot to that
OMG! How close was that! It was another quick yorker to which Miller gets an inside edge and the ball rolls past the stumps.
caught at point! The ship is sinking and sinking fast. Gul has four off seven balls. It was a length ball on off. Behaardien flashes at that one and Ahmed Shahzad takes a fine diving catch at point.
play and a miss as Peterson goes for a booming drive to a full delivery outside off, but misses
length ball on the leg side, the batsman stays on the back foot and glides it to fine leg for a single
back of length outside off, and the fielder are flying everywhere now. Shahzad makes an excellent stop at backward point
slower delivery hits the pads as the batsman goes for the pull. But it was touch too high and probably pitched outside leg too
full delivery outside off stump, the batsman comes forwards and squeezes it to backward point
a reverse sweep first up, but a harmless one as it goes tamely towards short third man
flatter delivery on the middle stump, the batsman stays on the back foot and whips it to deep midwicket
another flat delivery on off stump, the batsman stays on the back foot and punches it towards long on for a single
tossed up delivery and it is full too. The batsman goes for a sweep but the ball goes under his bat
on the middle and leg line, it is pushed to deep midwicket off the front foot
flat and quick around off stump, the batsman waits for it and cuts it hard to deep backward point for a couple
tosses it up wide outside off, the batsman plays it towards point, who throws it back quickly to stop the single
waits for the tossed up delivery outside off and runs it straight to short third man
on the off stump this time, the batsman goes back and dabs it towards midwicket for a single
bowls it really slow, the batsman has to wait and then he can only defend it back to the bowler
another slow one outside off, turns away a bit, guided to backward point
floated up to the batsman on the middle stump line, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to deep midwicket for a single
bowls it with a pause, the batsman stays on the back foot and punches it to wide long-on for a couple
comes down the pitch and takes the ball on the full, driven to long-off for a single
stays in the crease and tries to cut the ball, but it is too close to cut and he gets beaten
keeps it tight on the stumps and Peterson can only defend it back to the bowler
touch outside off and the batsman uses the room to cut it to deep point for a single

what a catch, it is Shahzad again at backward point. Miller tries to cut a delivery which is too close and gets a thick outside edge that flies between short third-man and backward point fielder. Shahzad goes running to his right and plucks the catch from thin air. Great effort. There was Irfan at short third-man and he was not expected to dive for that
it is some kind of a switch hit as Peterson smashes this in front of square, beats the deep cover fielder easily

now he makes room but gets a bottom edge that goes between the legs of the keeper. Irfan at the boundary collides with a ball boy who have come inside the boundary. He could have done some damage, suicidal. He is ok now and runs back with a smile
bowls it flatter on off, the batsman pushes it toward cover
flighted delivery on middle and leg, and the batsman gets a chance to go for a swing, he flicks it over square leg for a boundary
now he goes for a cross-batted swat and gets a whole lot of bat on that one. It is bludgeoned and it goes deep into the crowd at square leg
more cross-batted stuff, but this time it is hit straight to midwicket
floated up on the middle stump, the batsman goes for a slog but hits it along the ground to long-on
gets a low full-toss and Rory takes full advantage by clobbering this over extra cover. Into the crowd again
short ball now, and this one goes towards the big electronic screen around deep midwicket boundary. Absolutely smacked
this one spins down the leg side and the batsman misses. He was going for this one too

caught at deep extra cover! The fun is over. He takes a tiny step down the pitch and tries to send this to long-off but ends up slicing it towards deep extra cover where the fielder takes a simple catch

caught at short fine leg! Peterson tries to go with a kind of switch hit, but the ball is fired towards his leg stump and he only manages to get a top-edge that lobs towards the left of Afridi at short fine.
misses the hat-trick! It was tossed up delivery on the middle, and Tsotsobe was not holding bat, he went for a slog. Just missed it completely and the ball hit him on the pads
he bowls length and the batsman manages to chip it over extra cover for a couple of runs
short ball on the body, the batsman gets a top-edge, the ball lobs up for Kamran Akmal to take an easy catch. Gul gets his five-for
